topics.body:
Lucky Star ep2 impressions

!//derpicdn.net/img/2013/7/30/385521/medium.gif!:/385521

[spoiler]I like the concept of the side-by-side scene, and I like how they show how different Kagami and Tsukasa are. CHARACTER ESTABLISHMENT :D

...I have exams I could be studying for, thanks for reminding me, show :P

Passing by only studying last minute, if at all? ...Yeah pretty much me :P

what even is this dentist discussion tho

Konata: *incoherent mumbling*

And Akira continues to be two people, both upbeat and lethargic at once[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also a good episode, it's getting a bit better so far
